direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods provide iteration over the list, with listIterator offering more functionality.
Both methods access elements within the list, though get retrieves a specific element by index.
Both methods involve operations on the list at specific indices, though add inserts an element.
Both methods involve operations on the list at specific indices, though remove deletes an element.
Both methods involve operations on the list at specific indices, though set updates an element.
Both methods involve operations related to locating elements within the list.
Both methods involve accessing and manipulating the list's elements, though toArray converts the list to an array.
